column4: anyone know how to use vncviewer (xtightvncviewer or similar) to connect to a non-standard ssh port?
vncviewer -via <host> -p <port> <name:display> doesn't seem to work, just kinda pauses and hangs out in nothing-space
just searching for that but only come up with links for ssh
been looking for a bit ;)  works fine on 22 but... some yaya keeps trying to mess with my pretty lil 7.10 box
